scenario_text.value:
It’s no use, Takuma!
He’s too freaking strong!
Damn... At this rate, we’ll be—!

Miyuki! Please, Miyuki!
Open your eyes!

Remember what you said when we returned to
our world! That you’ll save him...save Haru!

There! Miyuki’s consciousness rose back to
the surface for a second!
Indeed! Now, look at this, sis!
I beg of you! Return to your senses!

Yes! It’s you and Haru in this photo! Please,
I’ll do anything to see that smile again!
